tasks.label: Start Server and Client
tasks.command: dotnet build /home/o9mansionboy/Documents/Space\ station\ 12/SS12Server/SS12Server.csproj && dotnet run --project /home/o9mansionboy/Documents/Space\ station\ 12/SS12Server/SS12Server.csproj & cd /home/o9mansionboy/Documents/Space\ station\ 12/SS12Client && npm run dev
